message.body: Mike, do you still maintain connections in the used car/wholesale market?
Hi Sam! No, have none, sorry
I saw via Facebook you were riding the rails. Chinatown disaster turn you off of buses?
If you're still in the area, want to help us field test the sangria?
Yeah, I ride Amtrak now. Makes me feel fancy. I'm actually at 30th street to head up now. Much love to you and yours, though. Doing well?
Fairly well. We bought a house. About 6 blocks from where we were.
Nice, that's a really cute neighborhood.
Pretty happy. Are you still in Brooklyn? I was in Manhattan from Monday to Thursday last week. I was contemplating giving a shout until I saw you were southbound on the Amtrak streaming Netflix.
Still studying. Not much of a student but keeping the grades up. Life's good- need to get out of the bike shop and find a more relevant job.
